io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network

Class JavaBinaryEventSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.AbstractEventSerializer
      • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network.JavaBinaryEventSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventSerializer

    public class JavaBinaryEventSerializer
extends AbstractEventSerializer
    Serialize the EventDispatch content using the Java serialization mechanism to generate the corresponding EventEnvelope.

    This implementation assumes that an EventEncrypter is injected.

    Version:
    2.0.1.0 2014-10-16 21:50:58
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland, Nicolas Gaud
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel
